## Question 1

What is $x^2$ when $x$ is 9?

1. 89
2. 90
3. 99
4. _81_

*** .hint 
What is $9 \times 9$?

*** .explanation 
When $x$ is 9, $x^2$ is $9^2$, which is $9 \times 9$.

## Interactive Chart

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}
require(rCharts)
haireye = as.data.frame(HairEyeColor)
n1 <- nPlot(Freq ~ Hair, group = 'Eye', type = 'multiBarChart',
  data = subset(haireye, Sex == 'Male')
)
n1$print('chart1')
```

## Interactive Console

```{r opts.label = 'interactive', results = 'asis'}
require(googleVis)
M1 <- gvisMotionChart(Fruits, idvar = 'Fruit', timevar = 'Year')
print(M1, tag = 'chart')
```
